name: Super Hero Moccasins Teal
description:
All Moccasins are made out of 100% Genuine Leather and are handcrafted by the Designer Melanie herself. 
Made in Michigan, USA 
FAAS moccasins come with an elastic at the opening. This also makes them kick proof, especially if you order for toddlers who love to kick off their shoes.  
The moccasins are easy to put on and easy to take off. 
All moccasins are made to order as of now, so please allow 10-14 days until your perfect pair is crafted and send out to you.

Moccasins are true to size and are available in children sizes 1 - 10.
